column3: School of Sport and Health Sciences
column5: This course is for you if you know you want to work in the world of sport and performance and are looking for a deeper understanding of applied sport physiology.Our Applied Sport Physiology MSc is designed around four pillars:practitioner focusedphysiology skill-centredscience in practicepersonal and professional development.All your modules can have a sport physiology focus and option modules will enable you to study an area of interest in greater depth.Our teaching laboratories are accredited by the British Association of Sport and Exercise Sciences (BASES).
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
